head.supplied: 2/9/59. ¶ My dear Mr Ligar. ¶ ¶ Allow me to enquire whether I could enjoy from you the kindness of getting a few copies of your excellent exploration chart of Australia ¶ for distribution to some sc...

div.p: B59/4743, unit 649, VPRS 44, inward registered and unregistered correspondence, VA 538 Department of Crown Lands and Survey, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Allow me to enquire whether I could enjoy from you the kindness of getting a few copies of your excellent exploration chart of Australia
Price (1859). for distribution to some scientific Societies, to which I send other Victorian publications.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;

div.p:
Ferd. Mueller.
On 8 September 1859 Ligar ordered that three copies of the chart be sent to M.
